description:
The component renders a `<th>` element when the parent context is a header
or otherwise a `<td>` element.

align.description:
Set the text-align on the table cell content.

Monetary or generally number fields **should be right aligned** as that allows
you to add them up quickly in your head without having to worry about decimals.

classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

component.description:
The component used for the root node.
Either a string to use a DOM element or a component.

padding.description:
Sets the padding applied to the cell.
By default, the Table parent component set the value (`default`).

size.description:
Specify the size of the cell.
By default, the Table parent component set the value (`medium`).

variant.description:
Specify the cell type.
By default, the TableHead, TableBody or TableFooter parent component set the value.

name: TableCell

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.head: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="head"` or `context.table.head`.
descriptions.body: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="body"` or `context.table.body`.
descriptions.footer: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="footer"` or `context.table.footer`.
descriptions.sizeSmall: Styles applied to the root element if `size="small"`.
descriptions.paddingCheckbox: Styles applied to the root element if `padding="checkbox"`.
descriptions.paddingNone: Styles applied to the root element if `padding="none"`.
descriptions.alignLeft: Styles applied to the root element if `align="left"`.
descriptions.alignCenter: Styles applied to the root element if `align="center"`.
descriptions.alignRight: Styles applied to the root element if `align="right"`.
descriptions.alignJustify: Styles applied to the root element if `align="justify"`.
descriptions.stickyHeader: Styles applied to the root element if `context.table.stickyHeader={true}`.
